entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain or snow this morning then to periods of snow later this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 early this morning then north 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
